title: Arma.3.Repack-R.G.Mechanics.[v 1.14]
description:
Arma.3.Repack-R.G.Mechanics.[v 1.14]



In the original: Arma 3 [v 1.14] 
Genre: Action, 3D, 1st Person, 3rd Person 
Year: 2013 
Publication Type: RePack [Repack] 
Tablet: enclosing RELOADED 
Version: v 1.14 
Language: ENG | MULTI9 
Voice set Language: ENG 

Description: 

ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation from 
independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed Operation 
Flashpoint. ARMA 3 absorbed all the best from the previous games in the series 
and has introduced many innovations. New physics engine allows the player to 
control the unprecedented realism fighting. The new model of behavior technology, 
the broadest range of weapons, from the already become classic M16 and 
AK74 before prototypes are not yet enrolled in a wide use, as well as the 
long-awaited series of fans the opportunity to swim under water. 
After several years of exhausting war, Europe has become the last 
refuge of the battles weakened NATO. Stratis island captured by 
the enemy on the Middle East and it will gain guaranteed superiority 
of NATO in the region. Operation has begun, "Magnitude": a small 
group of specially trained soldiers with scientists undercover sent 
to the island in the Mediterranean Sea. Mission in danger of collapse! 
The team is almost completely destroyed, and the main character, 
Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island. Complete the operation 
in his power, but his way there all the dangers of modern warfare, ruthless 
environment and numerical superiority of the enemy. Ponder will have every step! 

System requirements: 

Operating system: Windows Vista / 7/8 
Processor: Intel Dual Core processor with a clock speed of 2.4 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB 
Hard drive: 15 GB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX 9.0c 
Video Card: 512 MB VRAM (NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3830) 


Features:

- New game engine allows you to control the fighting with unprecedented realism. 
- Now you can dive under the water! 
- Variety of weapons - from the "classic" AK-74 and M-16 and not yet released into production prototypes. 
- Combining all the positive qualities predecessors, with a new engine and evolutionary features, ARMA 3 provides the player with nothing comparable experience tactical combat. 
- Create your own game scenarios using a simple and intuitive mission editor.



Repack  Features :

Do not cut / recoded
